description: Spoil yourself (not your bank balance) with this tasty Mexican-style seafood soup loaded with prawns, mussels, calamari, beans, veg and a hit of chilli.
name: Mexican-Style Seafood Soup Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 210g Woolworths Mexican style 3 bean mix no added salt

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a medium saucepan over medium heat. Add corn and capsicum, then cook for 5 minutes, stirring occasionally, or until capsicum has softened. Add chilli powder and cook for 1 minute, stirring, or until fragrant.

Add tomatoes and 1 cup water, then bring to the boil over high heat. Reduce heat to medium and simmer, covered, for 5 minutes or until vegetables are tender. Add beans and marinara, then cook, uncovered, for 2 minutes or until seafood is opaque and is just cooked through.
